ygData.subject: Re: About Lizardmen Crusaders...
ygData.msgSnippet: crusaders dont seem to have any set spawn point. im quite sure they are random spawns in spots that spawn higher level lizards (zealots etc..)which is good
ygData.messageBody:
crusaders dont seem to have any set spawn point. im quite sure they are
random spawns in spots that spawn higher level lizards (zealots etc..)which
is good imo...since it won't be possible for anyone group to monopolize the
spawn.

unfortunately, on my server the most accessible spawn was camped yesterday
by guess what?

a lv50 necro looking to twink his newbie sk...

the one decayed drop i have seen was a decayed right boot...suprise! seems
like this is the only drop that has showed up anywhere.

the one crusader i fought was mid 30's in level...hit for 80...hted at least
twice during the battle...and quite nearly wiped out all 3 people who
attacked it. without the help of a high level bard sending charmed gators at
it...it would surely have killed everyone.

so as it is...ive given up on these quests...im working on collecting all
the non-decayed component's i can for now. hopefully we'll stand a chance at
having a successful camp (sad that camping will be neccessary...since these
lizards are powerful enough that small to mid cazic xp group which is
generally <lv39 will have a hell of a time taking one down) when my partner
and i reach 50 over the next month sometime in the next month or so.

-kg

>From: "Princess Xaera" <xaera@...>
>Reply-To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>To: shadowknight@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [shadowknight] About Lizardmen Crusaders...
>Date: Fri, 15 Oct 1999 11:37:28 EDT
>
>Crusaders are Damn tough. I've seen some level 50 SK's try and solo them,
>and they got their asses handed to them. they're on steroids.
>Plus they're SK's also. They like to generally open with Harm Touch.
>
>Lowest level one I've seen was level 36.............
>
>
>>From: "Shanti Ashtangi" <zealpath@...>
>>
>>So, what level are they, and how hard are they to find within Cazic-Thule?

>>it up in case one of the inhabitants ends up being the key to an sk sword
>>etc...
